root.name: Wipeout
root.description:
Wipeout is the first release in the racing videogame series WipEout. Developed and published by Psygnosis, it was released in 1995 for PC.
Set in the year 2052, Wipeout features superfast anti-gravity racing with futuristic vehicles of 4 different teams, representing Japan, USA, Russia and Europe. 8 unique weapon pick-ups like mines, rockets and EMPs are available during racing on 7 fast paced tracks all around the globe. Explore and master challenging courses set in Japanese and German forests, in Canadian tech cities or even on icecold paths & caverns in Greenland to take home a legendary victory!
